assembly

Class AssemblyLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • assembly.AssemblyLine

  • public class AssemblyLine
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an AssemblyLine. It contains the workbenches and the pending jobs. It also stores the overtime of the day before.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssemblyLine(Clock clock)
      Construct a new AssemblyLine.

        public void addWorkBench(WorkBench bench)

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If bench==null

      • advance

        public void advance()
        This method advances the workbenches if all the workbenches are completed. It shifts the jobs to it's next workstation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If there are no currentJobs

      • convertOrderToJob

        public java.util.List<Job> convertOrderToJob(Order order)
        This method converts an order to a list of Jobs, 1 for each car.
        Parameters:
        order - The order that needs to be converted to a list of jobs.
        Returns:
        A list of jobs.

      • calculateEstimatedTime

        public void calculateEstimatedTime(Order order)
        Set the estimated time when all the jobs are completed. The Jobs from the order have to be added to the list of currentJobs.
        Parameters:
        order - The order to set the estimated time to.

      • getFutureAssemblyLine

        public AssemblyLine getFutureAssemblyLine()
        Get a clone of this AssemblyLine, advanced 1 hour forward.
        Returns:
        An AssemblyLine.
